name: Seasons Hospice & Palliative Care of Maryland, LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Seasons Hospice & Palliative Care of Maryland, LLC is a Hospice Care, Community Based provider based in Columbia, MD. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $84.9M in Medicaid payments across 19K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $84.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
